data.message: Mr. President we all had hope when you were elected that things would improve but as I watch us being invaded by millions of illegal immigrants and you and Congress bickering amongst your selves and what's up with this Iran deal that will eventually leave a radioactive crater where a city used to be,and this Obama care is a horror and a nightmare I need to see a doctor but where and how? and guns suppose Trump decides that states have to much power, and starts to put them under federal law and joins with Putin to take over the world. How we gonna fight them without guns? you may have good business skills but your people skills are severely lacking.
